text:
Chiyuki, this is the new costume design. It seems they've decided
on the colors and shapes to match the concept of the new song.

I can feel the attention to detail in the hem and
neckline... I really love this kind of thing...
Do you enjoy looking at design sketches?

Yes, even back in my student days,
just looking at books made me happy...

They're making these with us in mind, so...
I find it both exciting and enjoyable...

Enjoyable, huh? That's such a Chiyuki-like response,
but can I delve a bit deeper?

For example, here... when I see the ALSTROEMERIA dance,
I feel like they designed it with us in mind.

They've crafted it to create a beautiful silhouette when we
move... Making it easier for us to gesture with our hands.

It feels like I could become like a flower on stage...
I'm looking forward to the day we wear it...!
